name: Mortriden
description:
The idea behind Mortriden is to encourage replay, requiring players to remember paths taken and item locations to complete it within the required time frame on later runs.

Controls: E to pick notes up, Space to jump, Left/Right arrow keys to move.

PLEASE NOTE: This game has been created exclusively for gaining experience and receiving feedback and will therefore not be updated or amended as a result of any comments, aside from the few cosmetic updates already planned for the next version. Feedback/constructive criticism that be used and applied to future games would be appreciated.
